effect.exadditions.enderosis.description: Teleports you away from projectiles and water, but harms you when touching water.
enchantment.exadditions.vein_mine.desc: Mines an entire vein of ore at once.
enchantment.exadditions.renounce.desc: Adds +5 damage to axes but removes their bonus speed against logs.
enchantment.exadditions.mastery.desc: Increases mining speed the more blocks you mine with the tool.
enchantment.exadditions.risky.desc: Deals less damage on normal hits but more on critical hits.
enchantment.exadditions.extract.desc: Gain extra experience from killing mobs.
enchantment.exadditions.healthy.desc: Deal more damage the healthier you are.
enchantment.exadditions.lava_walker.desc: Turns lava beneath you into magma blocks temporarily.
enchantment.exadditions.magnetism.desc: Pulls in nearby dropped items toward you.
enchantment.exadditions.combo.desc: Build combos on consecutive kills for bonus damage.
enchantment.exadditions.breaking.desc: Deals reduced base damage but massively damages enemy armor.
enchantment.exadditions.homing.desc: Arrows and bolts home in on enemies near your aim.
enchantment.exadditions.lifesteal.desc: Heal a portion of the damage you deal.
enchantment.exadditions.farmer.desc: Replants crops automatically and prevents breaking baby plants.
enchantment.exadditions.all_in.desc: Exclusive enchantment. Triples base sword damage but prevents other enchantments.
enchantment.exadditions.adrenaline.desc: Deal more damage the lower your health is.
enchantment.exadditions.chance.desc: Applies looting effects to bows and crossbows.
enchantment.exadditions.siphon.desc: Drops from blocks go directly into your inventory.
enchantment.exadditions.rejuvenate.desc: Has a chance to restore durability over time or when healing.
enchantment.exadditions.ring_capacity.de: Increases the maximum number of protective rings that can be generated.
